SEARCH
Module LabAssignment
Package control

Class ApplicationController

java.lang.Object
control.ApplicationController
public class ApplicationController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing the lifecycle of Internship Applications. Handles logic for creating applications, processing approvals/rejections, managing student acceptances, and handling withdrawal requests.

      Constructs a new ApplicationController.
      Parameters:
      applicationRepository - The repository for application data access.
      internshipRepository - The repository for internship data access.
      userRepository - The repository for persisting user data changes (e.g., student state).

  • Method Details

    • getAllApplications

      public List<Application> getAllApplications()
      Retrieves all applications in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all applications.

    • getApplicationById

      public Application getApplicationById(String applicationId)
      Retrieves a specific application by its ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The unique ID of the application.
      Returns:
      The Application object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the application is not found.

    • getApplicationByStudentId

      public List<Application> getApplicationByStudentId(String studentId)
      Retrieves all applications submitted by a specific student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The student's ID.
      Returns:
      A list of applications.

    • getApplicationByInternshipTitle

      public List<Application> getApplicationByInternshipTitle(String internshipTitle)
      Retrieves all applications for a specific internship title.
      Parameters:
      internshipTitle - The title of the internship.
      Returns:
      A list of applications.

    • getPendingWithdrawalRequest

      public List<Application> getPendingWithdrawalRequest()
      Retrieves all applications that have a pending withdrawal request. Used by Career Center Staff to review withdrawals.
      Returns:
      A list of applications with pending withdrawals.

    • createApplication

      public Application createApplication(Student student, Internship internship)
      Creates a new internship application for a student. Validates eligibility based on:
      • Maximum active applications (Limit: 3).
      • Existing successful applications.
      • Student year vs. Internship level (Year 1/2 restricted to BASIC).
      • Internship status (Must be APPROVED and not FILLED).
      • Application deadlines.
      Parameters:
      student - The student applying.
      internship - The internship being applied for.
      Returns:
      The newly created and saved Application object.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If any validation rule is violated.
      IllegalStateException - If the application could not be created in the student object.

    • approveApplication

      public Application approveApplication(String applicationId)
      Approves a student's application. Updates the status to SUCCESSFUL and increments the internship's filled slots.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to approve.
      Returns:
      The updated Application object.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the student already has a job or the internship is full.

    • rejectApplication

      public Application rejectApplication(String applicationId)
      Rejects a student's application. Updates the status to UNSUCCESSFUL and recalculates the internship's filled slots logic.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to reject.
      Returns:
      The updated Application object.

    • acceptPlacement

      public Application acceptPlacement(String applicationId)
      Processes a student's acceptance of an internship offer. Verifies the application is SUCCESSFUL, then triggers the student entity logic to accept the offer and auto-withdraw other active applications.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application being accepted.
      Returns:
      The accepted Application object.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the application is not in SUCCESSFUL status or acceptance fails.

    • requestWithdrawal

      public Application requestWithdrawal(String applicationId)
      Flags an application for withdrawal. Requires Career Center Staff approval to finalize.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to withdraw.
      Returns:
      The updated Application object.

    • approveWithdrawal

      public Application approveWithdrawal(String applicationId)
      Approves a pending withdrawal request. Finalizes the withdrawal and updates internship slot counts if necessary.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application with the withdrawal request.
      Returns:
      The updated Application object.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If no withdrawal request exists.

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public Application rejectWithdrawal(String applicationId)
      Rejects a withdrawal request. Clears the withdrawal requested flag, returning the application to its previous state.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application.
      Returns:
      The updated Application object.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If no withdrawal request exists.

    • deleteApplication

      public void deleteApplication(String applicationId)
      Deletes an application from the system. Only allows deletion of PENDING applications.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to delete.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the application is not PENDING.
